QuestData.Title: Discarded Torments
QuestData.Description:
<The torn and faded pages depict punishments deemed too lenient and therefore disposed of.
Ve'nari may wish to study them.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Discarded Torments to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, a rare bit of insight into the minds of the Maw's eternal tormentors.
Quite fascinating... if a bit frightening.
